Question.Subject: can a bad registry cause links not to work? can the 'cleaners' cause all the problems?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
DS34,
Registry is a vital store of information. A bad registry can cause many dysfunctions in computers. Thats why experts advise to clean windows registry once in a month. It increase speed of computer and saves from many errors and crashes. You can use a free cleaner like CCleaner or paid like http://www.reginout.com/ Paid is often more up to date and come up with ready support facility.
